All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIPropertySupport, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
JYFormattedSearchField
public class JYSearchField
extends JYTextField

Extended JYTextField component which provides additional features like search controls. The search controls are a search button and a delete button. The search button is a simple button or a button with a popup menu. If the AUTO mode is set the component performs the specified search action automatically after the search delay. It's recommended to use this component in case that you want the component to act like a JTextField.

Version:
1.10, 19.11.2010
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

JYSearchField

public JYSearchField()
Constructs a JYSearchField. A default model is created, the initial value is null, and the number of columns is set to 0.

JYSearchField

public JYSearchField(java.lang.String text)
Constructs a JYSearchField initialized with the specified text. A default model is created and the number of columns is 0.

Parameters:
text - The text to be displayed, or null.

JYSearchField

public JYSearchField(int columns)
Constructs a JYSearchField with the specified number of columns. A default model is created and the initial string is set to null.

Parameters:
columns - The number of columns to use to calculate the preferred width; if columns is set to zero, the preferred width will be whatever naturally results from the component implementation.

JYSearchField

public JYSearchField(java.lang.String text,
                     int columns)
Constructs a JYSearchField initialized with the specified text and columns.

Parameters:
text - The text to be displayed, or null
columns - The number of columns to use to calculate the preferred width; if columns is set to zero, the preferred width will be whatever naturally results from the component implementation

JYSearchField

public JYSearchField(java.lang.String text,
                     int columns,
                     javax.swing.Action searchAction)
Constructs a JYSearchField initialized with the specified text and columns.

Parameters:
text - The text to be displayed, or null
columns - The number of columns to use to calculate the preferred width; if columns is set to zero, the preferred width will be whatever naturally results from the component implementation
searchAction - The action used for searching.

setSearchAction

public void setSearchAction(javax.swing.Action a)
Setter for the search action - action will be performed when i.e. the search button is clicked. The fired actionEvent is an instance of SearchActionEvent. A SearchActionEvent provides the initiator of the event via SearchActionEvent.getInitiator()

Parameters:
a - The search action.

getSearchAction

public javax.swing.Action getSearchAction()
Getter for the search action.

Returns:
The search action.

setSearchDelay

public void setSearchDelay(java.lang.Integer delay)
Specifies the search delay for AUTO search mode. If AUTO search mode is active the search action will be performed when no text input is made for the duration of the delay.

Parameters:
delay - The search delay in milliseconds > 0.
See Also:
getSearchDelay(), setSearchMode(SearchMode), setSearchAction(Action)

                           boolean isUIResource)
